Body:
block = """
    if test:
        print ''' this is a block of stuff.
this is more stuff in the block.
and more block.
'''
        do_more_stuff(g)
"""
stream = StringIO()
printer = PythonPrinter(stream)
printer.write_indented_block(block)
printer.close()
assert stream.getvalue() == """
if test:
    print ''' this is a block of stuff.
this is more stuff in the block.
and more block.
'''
    do_more_stuff(g)

"""
